desc: Remove pet hair and similar debris from MOST fabric surfaces AND remove loose, shedding hair from pets directly. No sticky/rubbery surfaces, NO refills, no extension cords or loud vacuums, no pulling hair from brushes/mitts/etc. Washable/reusable. Different colors,sizes,etc. 100% Made in the USA.

layout.text:
DOG HAIR IN THE CAR??!!
CAT HAIR ON YOUR CLOTHES??!!
A LITTLE DANDRUFF ON YOUR SHOULDER??
SICK OF NOISY, CUMBERSOME VACUUMS & PRODUCTS THAT JUST DON'T WORK??!!!
